title: Healthcare Coordinating Council; reconstitute and require to make report on specific health goals for the state.
subject: Public Health and Human Services

actions.description: Referred To Public Health and Human Services

extras.summary: AN ACT TO REENACT SECTIONS 41-105-1 AND 41-105-3, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, WHICH WERE REPEALED BY OPERATION OF LAW BY SECTION 7, CHAPTER 402, LAWS OF 2017, FOR THE PURPOSE OF RECONSTITUTING THE HEALTHCARE ADVISORY COUNCIL AND DIRECTING THE APPOINTMENT OF MEMBERS TO THE COUNCIL; TO ESTABLISH A COMPREHENSIVE PREVENTIVE HEALTH CARE PLAN FOR MISSISSIPPI AND DIRECT THE COUNCIL TO DEVELOP AND MAKE A REPORT TO THE LEGISLATURE AND THE GOVERNOR FOR THE 2026 REGULAR SESSION; TO SPECIFY HEALTH CARE GOALS FOR THE STATE THAT THE COUNCIL SHALL CONSIDER; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
